explanation: [0-0] The video begins with a man in a black and white striped shirt and black overalls standing by the pool of an aquarium, his arms open at his sides. To the right of the frame, a woman in an army green shirt and a man in a black T-shirt and a black and white baseball cap walk past. The man in the black T-shirt also has his arms open at his sides. A group of spectators is sitting in the lower part of the frame, with grayish-brown brick walls and a brown door in the distance.

[0-2] The man in the black and white striped shirt, wearing a white clown mask, turns to the left and looks at the man in the black T-shirt. The woman in the green shirt turns her head to the right, looking at the clown.
